ZHELL.CraftingCharacterFlag: When this actor crafts a magic item with a rarity of common or uncommon, the costs are halved.
ZHELL.CraftingComplete: {name} spent {amount} foraged materials to create one {link}.
ZHELL.CraftingDescriptionForaging: You are attempting to forage for materials. Select your method of foraging. The current DC is {dc}. Once you are done foraging (maximum of {max} hours), adjust and accept the results.
ZHELL.CraftingDescriptionMisc: Select a type of miscellaneous item to create.
ZHELL.CraftingDescriptionPoisons: Select a delivery method and a type of poison to create.
ZHELL.CraftingDescriptionPotions: Select a type of potion to create.
ZHELL.CraftingMissingMaterials: You need at least {cost} foraged materials to create this item.
ZHELL.CraftingMustRollOnce: You must roll at least once.
ZHELL.CraftingMustSelectScale: You must select a valid scale for the item.
ZHELL.CraftingTypeContact: This poison can be smeared on an object and remains potent until it is touched or washed off.
ZHELL.CraftingTypeIngested: A creature must swallow an entire dose of this poison to suffer its effects. The dose can be delivered in food or a liquid.
ZHELL.CraftingTypeInhaled: This poison takes effect when inhaled. Blowing the powder or releasing the gas subjects creatures in a 5-foot cube in front of you to its effect. The resulting cloud dissipates immediately afterward. Holding one's breath is ineffective against inhaled poisons, as they affect nasal membranes, tear ducts, and other parts of the body.
ZHELL.CraftingTypeInjury: This poison can be applied to weapons, ammunition, trap components, and other objects that deal piercing or slashing damage and remains potent until delivered through a wound or washed off.
ZHELL.CraftingWentForaging: {name} went foraging for {hours} hours and found {amount} lbs of forageable goods.
ZHELL.SettingsColorItemAttunedHint: The color of the attunement icon when attuned to an item.
ZHELL.SettingsColorItemNotAttunedHint: The color of the attunement icon when not attuned to an item.
ZHELL.SettingsColorShowLimitedUsesHint: Create colored dots on the sheet for items with limited uses.
ZHELL.SettingsColorShowSpellSlotsHint: Create colored dots on the sheet for spell slots.
ZHELL.SettingsColorSpellAlwaysPreparedHi: The color of the prepared icon when a spell is permanently prepared.
ZHELL.SettingsColorSpellNotPreparedHint: The color of the prepared icon when a spell is not prepared.
ZHELL.SettingsColorSpellPreparedHint: The color of the prepared icon when a spell is prepared.
ZHELL.SettingsColorUsesUnexpendedHint: The color of available limited uses and spell slots.
ZHELL.SettingsCombatantDefeatedHint: When combatants that are not owned by a player is reduced to 0 or less hp, mark them as defeated.
ZHELL.SettingsDisplayAmmoHint: If ammunition has a saving throw, it will be displayed when a weapon makes an attack roll.
ZHELL.SettingsMenuColorSettingsHint: Settings for the colors that are applied to the actor sheets.
ZHELL.SettingsMenuRarityColorsHint: Settings for the colors that are applied to items on an actor sheet depending on rarity.
ZHELL.SettingsMenuWorldSettingsHint: A collection of additions and replacements for core and system content.
ZHELL.SettingsTrackReactionsHint: Track reactions for combatants when combat is ongoing.
ZHELL.SettingsWorldAddConditionsHint: An addition to current available conditions.
ZHELL.SettingsWorldAddEquipmentHint: An addition to current available equipment types. Not armor.
ZHELL.SettingsWorldAddPietyHint: Adds 'Piety' as a new ability score and 'Divine Boon' as a feature type.
ZHELL.SettingsWorldCollapsibleHeadersHin: Make headers collapsible on actor sheets.
ZHELL.SettingsWorldCreateForagingHint: Create a Foraging button on the sheet.
ZHELL.SettingsWorldCreateMoneySpenderHin: Create a 'Spend Money' button on the sheet.
ZHELL.SettingsWorldRemoveAlignmentHint: Remove the Alignment field from character sheets.
ZHELL.SettingsWorldReplaceConsumablesHin: Replace the selection of available consumable types.
ZHELL.SettingsWorldReplaceLanguagesHint: Replace the selection of available languages.
ZHELL.SettingsWorldReplaceTokenCondition: Replace the core conditions on the token HUD.
ZHELL.SettingsWorldReplaceToolsHint: Replace the selection of available tools.
ZHELL.SettingsWorldReplaceWeaponsHint: Replace the selection of available weapons. Also gets rid of firearm-specific weapon attributes.
ZHELL.StatusConditionExhaustionDescripti: You have a −{level} penalty to your attack rolls, saving throws, ability checks, and spell save DC. If your level of exhaustion exceeds 10, you die. When you finish a long rest, you may remove one level of exhaustion.
ZHELL.StatusConditionReactionDescription: You have spent your reaction on {name}. You cannot take another reaction until the start of your next turn.
